name: Crab Chase
description:
Crab Chase made for the Weekly Game jam - Week 162, Theme: 'Crabs'

by HariBeaver

Very rough and unpolished. Full of bugs. :)

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Camera: left-right arrows

Jump: Spacebar

Objective: Collect 10 crabs scattered around the map. Watch out for moving enemies. Don't let your crabs be touched by moving enemies or else you will have to pick them up again.

Good Luck!

PS: Sorry for no audio and ALT+F4 to exit!
